short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copies the entire text of the current webpage to the clipboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your browsing experience with the Webpage Content Copier & ChatGPT Assistant Extension! This user-friendly tool allows you to effortlessly copy the entire content of any webpage with a simple click. Hereâ€™s how it works:

One-Click Content Copying: Just click anywhere on the current webpage, and the extension will automatically copy all the text content for you.

Instant Alert Notification: As soon as the content is copied, an alert will pop up to inform you that the webpage content has been successfully copied.

Seamless ChatGPT Integration: After acknowledging the alert, the extension will immediately open ChatGPT in a new tab. You can then paste the copied content and interact with ChatGPT to perform any task you need, such as summarizing the content, generating insights, asking questions, and much more.


This extension is perfect for researchers, students, writers, and anyone who frequently interacts with online content and needs the power of ChatGPT for enhanced productivity. Simplify your workflow and let this extension handle the busywork, so you can focus on what matters most.
